recipesJson.name: Tart Berry Candy
recipesJson.author: spicygal
recipesJson.description: okay looking for inspiration I was checking out y'all's recipes and came across 'member berries from vix (thank you!!!) and even though he says you need all these ingredients I am not going to buy more flavors when I have a ton already - so here's a take-off from that - thanks for the inspiration - thanks so much - it looks great!!!  Also wanted to finally use bubblegun - it says Loranns but there is no bubblegum from Loranns in the list so I put RF

reviews.text: I have a big bottle of LorAnn's bubble gum. I think I got it thru Amazon. Just fyi
